alert.note: Alert for Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 1:01PM ADT until October 27 at 5:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Arroyo County in Puerto Rico... Cayey County in Puerto Rico... Coamo County in Puerto Rico... Guayama County in Puerto Rico... Juana Diaz County in Puerto Rico... Salinas County in Puerto Rico... Santa Isabel County in Puerto Rico... Villalba County in Puerto Rico... * Until 400 PM AST. * At 1201 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 2 to 3 inches through 4 PM AST. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...2-3 INCHES IN 3 HOURS
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba
